Main

main.py

This file contains the flask server and the tournament cache.

main.check_tournament_exists(tournament_id) → bool[source]

This function checks if a tournament with given id exists in the tournament cache.

Parameters

tournament_id (str) – The id of the tournament to be checked.

Return type

bool

main.get_tournament(tournament_id) → tournament.Tournament | None[source]

This function returns a tournament from the tournament cache, given an id. If the tournament with the given id does not exist, it returns None.

Parameters

tournament_id (str) – The id of the tournament to be returned.

Return type

Tournament or None
